line.token: * This file is part of Composer.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* Represents a problem detected while solving dependencies
* A map containing the id of each rule part of this problem as a key
* A set of reasons for the problem, each is a rule or a job and a rule
* Add a rule as a reason
* @param Rule $rule A rule which is a reason for this problem
* Retrieve all reasons for this problem
* A human readable textual representation of the problem's reasons
* @param array $installedMap A map of all installed packages
'your HHVM version does not satisfy that requirement.'
'you are running this with PHP and not HHVM.'
'has the wrong version installed, try upgrading the intl extension.'
'is missing from your system, make sure the intl extension is loaded.'
' has the wrong version installed or is missing from your system, make sure to load the extension providing it.'
' could not be found, it looks like its name is invalid, "'
'" is not allowed in package names.'
' but these conflict with your requirements or minimum-stability.'
' but these are rejected by your constraint.'
' could not be found in any version, there may be a typo in the package name.'
* Store a reason descriptor but ignore duplicates
* @param string $id A canonical identifier for the reason
* Turns a job into a human readable description
'No package found to satisfy install request for '
* Turns a constraint into text usable in a sentence describing a job
